definitions.definition: the person or people who; any person who

examples.text: Whoever says that is a liar.
Send it to whoever is in charge of sales.

definitions.definition: used to say that it does not matter who, since the result will be the same

examples.text: Come out of there, whoever you are.
I don't want to see them, whoever they are.

definitions.definition: used in questions to mean ‘who’, expressing surprise

examples.text: Whoever heard of such a thing!
